text:
Michael Falzon (16 May 1972 – 23 June 2020) was an Australian musical theatre and rock tenor actor, and producer. He ran his own production company, Good Egg Creative. He was born in Sydney. He was known for his roles in "Rock of Ages" and "Hedwig and The Angry Inch".
Falzon died on 23 June 2020 from cancer in Sydney, aged 48.
